job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtmultiple roles available at the junior intermediate and senior levels in toronto and san franciscoltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtat kindred we are on a mission to build humanlike intelligence in machinesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtsince weve been paving the way for a world filled with more powerful and helpful ai systemsampnbspwe bring together reinforcement learning machine learning and remote human guidance to create intelligent robots that solve realworld problems alongside humans in complex changing environments like todays supply chainltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtas a software developer you will work within an agile engineering team that works with rapid iterations and continuous improvement to create the most intelligent robotics system for our customers youll collaborate crossfunctionally with roboticists software and machine learning developers researchers product managers and mechanical engineers to design build and support software features across multiple codebases for robot control motion planning perception sensor fusion humanrobot interaction and device driversampnbspwith a focus on product performance safety usability scalability and maintainability youll test these features in our lab cut releases for qa and deploy experiment monitor and optimize them on kindreds fleet of robots in productionampnbspin this role you will be part of an oncall rotation in order to service our customers across north americaltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtin this role you will be part of an oncall rotation which will be outlined during the interview processltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwe are currently hiring software developers of all levels for both our san francisco and toronto locationsltpgtltpgtltstronggtevery day will bring new and exciting challenges on the job while youltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtdesign and develop software against functional and system requirementsltligtltligtwork closely with a crossfunctional team to understand and clarify requirementsltligtltligtensure architectural integrity and product quality across team effortsltligtltligtdesign code test debug and document software componentsltligtltligtassist troubleshooting problems in development and production environmentsltligtltligtmentor grow and motivate junior team members interns and peersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhat you bringltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtexpertise in designing developing and operating complex software solutions both greenfield and evolvingltligtltligtsignificant development experience in modern c python on linuxltligtltligtreliable production of quality software within time and resource constraintsltligtltligtcomplete familiarity with modern software development processes such as design documentation code reviews cicd testing project management workflow and source control conventionsltligtltligtexcellent analytical problem solving communication and organization skillsltligtltligtdedication to meeting project deadlines and an ability to propose wellreasoned options under pressureltligtltligtexcellent understanding of the organizations goals and objectivesltligtltligtbachelors degree in computer science computer engineering or equivalentltligtltligtdepending on level you will have years of varied and progressive professional experienceltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtbonus
